title: Process Synchronization
subject: Operating Systems
theory:
When processes share data, order of execution matters. A **Race Condition** occurs when output depends on timing. 
Synchronization ensures processes communicate safely without corrupting data.

examples.code:
P1: x++
P2: x--
Hardware may mix instructions. Result could be x, x+1, or x-1.

common_mistakes.correction: Volatile only prevents caching, it doesn't make read-modify-write atomic.

real_world_use_cases.description: Two withdrawals at same time must not exceed balance.
